original_title: エリザベート-愛と死の輪舞-
overview: Takarazuka Revue's 2002 production of the Viennese musical Elisabeth. It portrays the life and death of Empress Elisabeth of Austria, wife of Emperor Franz Joseph I. This was the 4th production of Elisabeth for Takarazuka Revue and first for the Flower Troupe.
tagline: The Rondo of Love and Death
title: Elisabeth
